name: Forgotten Vault
description: A secure storage facility contains valuable items, important documents, or dangerous artifacts that were sealed away for safety. The valuable contents and important secrets attract treasure hunters and scholars, while the security systems and dangerous contents create constant hazards.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers designed to protect and hide. Air carries old magic, valuable treasures, and forgotten secrets scent. Massive doors and security systems guard secrets sealed away for centuries. Skin tingles with presence of security systems and magical wards. Taste of ancient wealth and dangerous artifacts fills mouth. Weight of valuable contents and important secrets presses down on you.
